value.name: POLICE NEWS: Police make OWI arrest after crash injures three
value.description: An SUV driven by Abraham Martinez Corona, collided with a pickup truck driven by Brandon Kauffman, Elkhart, after Elkhart County police said Martinez Corona failed to yield the right of way at Ind. 15 and U.S. 20 around 9:30 p.m., a news release shows.

about.name: United States Office of War Information

value.name: POLICE NEWS: Crash leaves two injured
value.description: Two people were injured in a two-vehicle crash at C.R. 40 and C.R. 15, three miles west of Goshen, at 4:26 p.m. Tuesday. Gene Duffin, 84, Goshen, was driving a 2007 Lexus south on C.R. 15, north ...
